question: A person crosses a 600m long street in 5 minutes, at what speed in kmph is he moving?
What is the average (arithmetic mean) of  2x + 5,  5x – 6 and -4x + 2?
For every x ≠Θ, (x2 + x2 + x2)/ x2
An aeroplane covers x km at a speed of 240kmph in 5 hours.  To cover the same distance in 12/3 hours, at what speed must it travel?

A train travels 50% faster than a car.  If they start at point A ad arrive at the same time at point B, which is 75km away.  Given that the train stops at stations in between both points for a total of 12.5minutes, what is the speed of the car?
In a triangle, if angle A = 70 degrees and C = 45 degrees, what is angle B?
A bus travels at a speed of 54kmph, but due to a breakdown, stopped for some time before moving again.  If at the end of an hour it covers 45 km, for how long did it stop?
Tickets are numbered 1 to 20 and mixed up.  If you draw one ticket from the pack, what is the probability that the ticket drawn has a number which is a multiple of 3 or 5?
A bag contains 2 red, 3 green and 2 blue balls.  Two balls are drawn at random, what is the probability that none of the balls drawn is blue?
